name: Grandfatherâ€™s Blessing
description: Once per battle you may move the cycle of corruption forward.

name: Living Plague
description: Hero Phase 2+ 1 disease for units within 7".

name: Avalanche of Rotten Flesh
description: After charge enemy within 1" 1 die per charge roll 6+ MW.

name: Bloated with Corruption
description: On disustingly resilient 6 give disease to unit within 3".

name: Overpowering Stench
description: Units within 7" cannot issue or recieve commands.

name: Gift of Febrile Frenzy
description: Once per battle in combat phase +1A to friendly within 7".

name: Nurgling Infestation
description: -1A targeting this general +1 to-hit for nurglings wholly within 7".

name: Pestilent Breath
description: Start of shooting enemy unit within 7" 1 die per model 5+ MW.
